Package com.jesusnut.listeners

Class ExtentReportListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jesusnut.listeners.ExtentReportListener

extends java.lang.Object
implements org.testng.ITestListener
    ExtentReportListener class is a listener class implementing ITestListener

    1.0

    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private static java.lang.String getTestDescription​(org.testng.ITestResult result)
      Returns description of a test method.
      If description is not provided explicitly in a test method like @Test(description=xxx), then test method name is considered as its test description.
      void onFinish​(org.testng.ITestContext context)
      Performs the basic termination steps required for Extent Reports.
      void onStart​(org.testng.ITestContext context)
      Performs the basic initialization required for Extent Reports.
      void onTestFailure​(org.testng.ITestResult result)
      Marks the test node/test case as fail, appends base64 screenshot and logs it in the Extent Report.
      Sets end time for the test node that has failed.
      Logs the exception (cause of failure) in the Extent Report.
      void onTestSkipped​(org.testng.ITestResult result)
      Marks the test node/test case as skipped, logs it and also logs the cause of skip in the Extent Report.
      Sets end time for the test node that has skipped.
      Logs the exception (cause of failure) in the Extent Report.
      void onTestStart​(org.testng.ITestResult result)
      Creates ExtentTest test node for each testNG test method, assign author, assign category and set start time of that test node on its start.
      void onTestSuccess​(org.testng.ITestResult result)
      Marks the test node/test case as pass and logs it in the Extent Report.
      Appends base64 screenshots if ConfigFactory.hasPassedStepsScreenshots() is set to true.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Methods inherited from interface org.testng.ITestListener

        onTestFailedButWithinSuccessPercentage, onTestFailedWithTimeout

      • getTestDescription

        private static java.lang.String getTestDescription​(org.testng.ITestResult result)
        Returns description of a test method.
        If description is not provided explicitly in a test method like @Test(description=xxx), then test method name is considered as its test description.
        Parameters:
        result - ITestResult
        Returns:
        description of a test method in String

      • onTestStart

        public void onTestStart​(org.testng.ITestResult result)
        Creates ExtentTest test node for each testNG test method, assign author, assign category and set start time of that test node on its start.
        Specified by:
        onTestStart in interface org.testng.ITestListener

      • onTestSuccess

        public void onTestSuccess​(org.testng.ITestResult result)
        Marks the test node/test case as pass and logs it in the Extent Report.
        Appends base64 screenshots if ConfigFactory.hasPassedStepsScreenshots() is set to true.
        Sets end time for the test node that has passed successfully.
        Specified by:
        onTestSuccess in interface org.testng.ITestListener

      • onTestFailure

        public void onTestFailure​(org.testng.ITestResult result)
        Marks the test node/test case as fail, appends base64 screenshot and logs it in the Extent Report.
        Sets end time for the test node that has failed.
        Logs the exception (cause of failure) in the Extent Report.
        Specified by:
        onTestFailure in interface org.testng.ITestListener

      • onTestSkipped

        public void onTestSkipped​(org.testng.ITestResult result)
        Marks the test node/test case as skipped, logs it and also logs the cause of skip in the Extent Report.
        Sets end time for the test node that has skipped.
        Logs the exception (cause of failure) in the Extent Report.
        Specified by:
        onTestSkipped in interface org.testng.ITestListener
